GK19bahcar4u:0: caturtha ucchvāsaḥ yogaṃsvapne 'pi necchanti kurvate nakaragraham /
GK19bahcar4u:3: vipule 'pi pṛthupratimo danta iva gaṇādhipasya mukhe // 4.2 //
GK19bahcar4u:7: mahābhāravāhanayogyaḥ sāgara iva sagaraprabhāvāt, durjayabalasanātho harivaṃśa iva sūrānnirjagāma rājavaṃśaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:9: pratāpākrāntabhuvanāḥ kiraṇā iva tejonidheḥ, vigrahavyāptadiṅmukhā giraya iva bhūbhṛtpravarāt, dharaṇidhāraṇakṣamā diggajā iva brahnakarāt, udadhīn pātumudyatā jaladharā iva ghanāgamāt, icchāphaladāyinaḥ kalpatarava iva
GK19bahcar4u:10: nandanāt, sarvabhūtāśrayā viśvarūpaprakārā iva śrīdharādajāyanta rājānaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:11: teṣu caivamutpadyamāneṣu krameṇodapādi hūṇahariṇakesarī sindhurājajvaro gūrjaraprajāgaro gāndhārādipagandhadvipakūṭapākalo lāṭapāṭavapāṭaccaro mālavalakṣmīlatāparaśuḥ pratāpaśīla iti prathitāparanāmā prabhākaravardhano nāma rājādhirājaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:12: yo rājyāṅgasaṅgīnyabhiṣicyamāna eva malānīva mumoca dhanāni /
GK19bahcar4u:13: yaḥ parakīyenāpi kātaravallabhena raṇamukhe tṛṇeneva dhṛtenālajjata jīvitena /
GK19bahcar4u:14: yaḥ karadhṛtadhautāsipratibimbitenātmanāpyadūyata samitiṣu sahāyena ripūṇāṃ puraḥ pradhaneṣu dhanuṣāpi namatā yo mānī mānasenākhidyata /
GK19bahcar4u:16: yaśca sarvāsu dikṣu samīkṛtataṭāvaṭaviṭapāṭavītarutṛṇagulmavalmīkagirigahanairdaṇḍayātrāpathaiḥ pṛthubhirbhṛtyopayogāya vyabhajateva vasudhāṃ bahudhā /
GK19bahcar4u:19: yasya ca vahnimayo hṛdayeṣu, jalamayo locanapuṭeṣu, mārutamayo
GK19bahcar4u:20: niḥśvasiteṣu, kṣamāmayo 'ṅgeṣu, ākāśamayaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ, pañcamahābhūtamayo mūrta ivādṛśyata nihatapratisāmantāntaḥpureṣu pratāpaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:21: yasya cāsanneṣu bhṛtyaratneṣu pratibimbateva tulyarūpā sa ptalakṣyata lakṣmīḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:22: tathā ca yasya pratāpāgninā bhūtiḥ, śauryoṣmaṇā siddhiḥ, asidhārājalena
GK19bahcar4u:24: yaśca vairamupāyanaṃ vigrahamanugrahaṃ samarāgamaṃ mahotsavaṃ śatruṃ nidhidarśanamaribāhulyamabhyudayamāhavāhvānaṃ varapradānabhavaskandapātaṃ diṣṭavṛddhiṃ śastraprahārapatanaṃ vasudhārārasamamanyata /
GK19bahcar4u:26: diṅmukhavisarpibhiradhvaradhūmaiḥ palāyitamiva kalinā, sasudheḥ surālayairavatīrṇāmiva svargeṇa,
GK19bahcar4u:31: tasya ca janmāntare 'pi satī pārvatīva śaṅkarasya, gṛhītaparahṛdayā lakṣmīriva lokaguroḥ, sphurattaralatārakā rohiṇīva kalāvataḥ,
GK19bahcar4u:32: sarvajanajananī buddhiriva prajāpateḥ, mahābhūbhṛtkulodgatā gaṅgeva vāhinīnāyakasya, mānasānuvartanacaturā haṃsīva rājahaṃsasya,
GK19bahcar4u:41: saṃbhāṣaṇeṣu, amṛtamayīva tṛṣyatsu, vṛṣṭimayīva bhṛtyeṣu, nirvṛtimayīva
GK19bahcar4u:51: saṃyatiriva, dhairyasyāpi dhṛtiriva, vibhramasyāpi vibrāntiriha, yaśomatī nāma mahādevī prāṇānāṃ praṇayasya visrambhasya dhramasya sukhasya ca
GK19bahcar4u:54: nisargata eva ca sa nṛpatirādityabhakto babhūva /
GK19bahcar4u:55: pratidinamudaye dinakṛtaḥ snātaḥ sitadukūladhārī dhavalakarpaṭaprāvṛtaśirāḥ prāṅmukhaḥ kṣitau jānubyāṃ sthitvā kuṅkumapaṅkānulipte maṇḍalake pavitrapajharāgapātrīnihitena svahṛdayeneva sūryānuraktena raktakamalaṣaṇḍenārghaṃ dadau /
GK19bahcar4u:56: ajapacca japyaṃ sucaritaḥ pratyuṣasi madhyandine dinānte cāpatyahetoḥ prādhvaṃ prayatena manasā jañjapūko mantramādityahṛdayam /
GK19bahcar4u:58: yataḥ sarājā kadācid grīṣmasamaye yadṛcchayā sitakarakarasitasudhādhavalasya harmyasya pṛṣṭe suṣvāpa /
GK19bahcar4u:59: vāmapārśve cāsya dvitīyaśayane devī yaśomatī śiśye /
GK19bahcar4u:60: piraṇataprāyāyāṃ tu śyāmāyām, āsannaprabhātavelāvilupyamānalāvaṇye lilambiṣamāṇe sīdattejasi tārakeśvare, karāgraspṛṣṭakumudinīpramodajanmani śaśadharasveda iva galatyatiśītale 'vaśyāyapayasi,
GK19bahcar4u:62: saṃvāhyamānacaraṇa iva tārakābhiḥ visrabdhaprasāritairdigaṅganānāmivārpitairaṅgairmadhusugandhibhiḥ svahastakamalatālavṛntavātairiva śvasitairmukhaśriyā vījyamāne vimalakapolasthalasthitena sitakusumaśekhareṇeva ratikelikacagrahalambitena pratimāśaśibimbena virājite svapati devī yaśomatī sahasaiva "āryaputra! paritrāyasva paritrāyasva' iti bhāṣamāṇā bhūṣaṇaraveṇa vyāharantīva parijanamutkampamānāṅgayaṣṭirudatiṣṭhat /
GK19bahcar4u:63: atha tena sarvasyāmapi pṛthivyāmaśrutapūrveṇa kimuta devīmukhe paritrāyasveti dhvaninā dagdha iva śravaṇayorekapada eva nidrāṃ tatyāja rājā /
GK19bahcar4u:64: śirobhāgācca kopakampamānadakṣiṇakarākṛṣṭena karṇotpaleneva nirgacchatācchadhāreṇa dhautāsinā sīmantayanniva niśām,
GK19bahcar4u:66: karavikṣepavegagalitena hṛdayeneva bhayanimittānveṣiṇā bhramatā dikṣu kanakavalayena virājamānaḥ,
GK19bahcar4u:67: satvarāvatāritavāmacaraṇākrāntikampitaprāsādaḥ, puraḥ patitenāsidhārāgocaragatena śaśimayūkhakhaṇḍeneva khaṇḍitena hāreṇa rājamānaḥ, lakṣmīcumbanalagnatāmbūlarasarañjitābhyāmiva nidrayā kopena
GK19bahcar4u:68: cātilohitābhyāṃ locanābhyāṃ pāṭalayanparyantānāśānām, baddhāndhakārayā tripatākayā bhrukuṭyā punariva triyāmāṃ parivartayan "devi! na bhetavyaṃ na bhetavyam' ityabhidadhāno vegenotpapāta sarvāsu ca dikṣu vikṣiptacakṣuryadā nādrākṣītkiñcidapi tadā papraccha tāṃ bhayakāraṇam /
GK19bahcar4u:69: atha gṛhadevatāsviva pradhāvitāsu yāmikinīṣu, prabuddhe ca samīpaśāyini
GK19bahcar4u:70: parijane, śānte ca hṛdayotkampakāriṇi sādhvase sā samabhāṣata--"āryaputra!
GK19bahcar4u:71: jānāmi svapne bhagavataḥ saviturmaṇḍalānnirgatya dvau kumārakau,
GK19bahcar4u:72: tejomayau, bālātapenevāpūrayantau digbhāgān, vaidyutamiva jīvalokaṃ kurvāṇau, mukuṭinau, kuṇḍalinau, aṅgadinau, kavacinau, gṛhotaśastrau,
GK19bahcar4u:73: indragopakarucā rudhireṇa snātau, unmukhenottamāṅgaghaṭamānāñjalinā jagatā nikhilena praṇamyamānau, kanyayaikayā ca candramūrtyeva
GK19bahcar4u:75: tau ca me vilapantyāḥ śastreṇodaraṃ vidārya praveṣṭumārabdhau /
GK19bahcar4u:78: etasminneva ca kālakrame rājalakṣmyāḥ prathamālāpaḥ prathayanniva svapnaphalamupatoraṇaṃ rarāṇa prabhātaśaṅkhaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:82: puruṣaśca vallabhaturaṅgamandurāmandire mandamandaṃ suptotthitaḥ saptīnāṃ kṛtamadhuraheṣāravāṇāṃ puraścyotattuṣārasalilaśīkaraṃ kiranmarakataharitaṃ yavasaṃ vaktrāparavaktre papāṭha--
GK19bahcar4u:96: tataḥ samatikrānte kasmiṃścitkālāṃśe devyāṃ ca yaśomatyāṃ devo rājyavardhanaḥ prathamameva saṃbabhūva garbhe /
GK19bahcar4u:97: garbhasthitasyaiva ca yasya yaśaseva pāṇḍutāmādata jananī /
GK19bahcar4u:100: śanaiḥ śanairupacīyamānagarbhamarālasā ca gurubhirvāritāpi vandanāya kayamapi sakhībhirhastāvalambenānīyata
GK19bahcar4u:108: āstāṃ nūpurabhārakheditaṃ caraṇayugalaṃ manasāpi nodasahata saudhamāroḍhum
GK19bahcar4u:112: divasaṃ cādhomukhī stanapṛṣṭhasaṃkrāntenāpatyadarśanautsukyādantaḥ praviṣṭeneva mukhakamalenaivaṃ prīyamāṇā dadarśa garbham /
GK19bahcar4u:113: udare tanayena hṛdaye ca bharvā tiṣṭhatā dviguṇitāmiva lakṣmīmuvāha /
GK19bahcar4u:114: sakhyutsaṅgamuktaśarīrā ca śarīraparicārikāṇāmaṅkeṣu sapatnīnāṃ tu śiraḥsu pādau cakāra /
GK19bahcar4u:115: avatīrṇe ca daśame māsi sarvorvībhṛtpakṣapātāya vajraparamāṇubiriva
GK19bahcar4u:116: nirmitam, tribhuvanabhāradhāraṇasamarthaṃ śeṣaphaṇāmaṇḍalopakaraṇairiva kalpitam, sakalabhūbhṛtkampakāriṇaṃ diggajāvayavairiva vihitamasūta devaṃ rajiyavardhanam /
GK19bahcar4u:117: yasmiṃśca jāte jātapramodā nṛtyamayya ivājāyanta prajāḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:118: pūritāsaṃkhyaśaṅkhaśabdamukharaṃ prahatapaṭahaśatapaṭuravaṃ gambhīraberīninādanirbharabharitabhuvanaṃ pramodonmattamartyalokamanoharaṃ māsamekaṃ divasamiva mahotsavamakaronnarapatiḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:119: athānyasminnatikrānte kasmiṃścitkāle kandalini kuḍmalitakadambatarau rūḍhatokmatṛṇastambe stambitatāmarase vikasitacātakacetasi mūkamānasaukasi nabhasi māsi devyā devakyā iva cakrapāṇiryaśomatyā hṛdaye garbhe ca samameva saṃbabhūva harṣaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:121: garbhārambheṇa śyāmāyamānacārucūcukacūliko cakravartinaḥ pātuṃ mudritāviva payodharakalaśau babhāroraḥsthaleva /
GK19bahcar4u:124: marndaṃ-mandaṃ saṃcarantyā nirmalamaṇikuṭṭimanimagnapratibimbanibhena gṛhīta pādapallavā pūrvasevāmivārebhe pṛtivyasyāḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:126: kṣapāsu saudhaśikharāgragatāyā garbhonmāthamaktāṃśuke stanamaṇḍale saṃkrāntamuḍupatimaṇḍalamupari garbhasya śvetātapatramiva kenāpi dhāryamāṇamadṛśyata /
GK19bahcar4u:131: api ca caturṇāmapi mahārṇavānāmekīkṛtenāmbhasā snātuṃ vāñchā babhūva /
GK19bahcar4u:134: saṃnihiteṣvapi maṇidarpaṇeṣu mukhamutkhāte khaḍāgapaṭṭe vīkṣituṃ vyasanamāsīt /
GK19bahcar4u:138: sakhyaścāsyāḥ pramodavisphāritairlocanapuṭairāsannaprasavamahotsavadhiyeva dhavalayantyo bhavanaṃ vikacakumudakamalakuvalayapalāśavṛṣṭimayaṃ rakṣābalinidhimivānavarataṃ vidadhānā dikṣu kṣaṇamapi na mumucuḥ pārśvam /
GK19bahcar4u:139: ātmocitasthānaniṣaṇṇāśca mahānto vividhauṣadhidharā bhiṣajo bhūdharā iva bhuvo dhṛtiṃ cakruḥ
GK19bahcar4u:140: payonidhīnāṃ hṛdayānīva lakṣmyā sahāgatāni grīvāsūtragranthiṣu praśastaratnānyabadhyatta /
GK19bahcar4u:141: tataśca prāpte jyeṣṭhāmūlīye māsi bahulāsu bahulapakṣadvādasyāṃ vyatīte pradoṣasamaye samārurukṣati kṣapāyauvane sahasaivāntaḥpure samudapādi kolāhalaḥ strījanasya /
GK19bahcar4u:142: nirgatya ca saṃbhramaṃ yaśovatyāḥ svayameva hṛdayanirviśeṣā dhātryāḥ sutā supātreti nāmnā rājñaḥ pādayornipatya "deva /
GK19bahcar4u:143: diṣṭyā vardhase dvitīyasutajanmanā' iti vyāharantī pūrṇapātraṃ jahāra /
GK19bahcar4u:144: asminneva ca kāle rājñaḥ paramasaṃmataḥ śataśaḥ saṃvāditātīndriyādeśaḥ,
GK19bahcar4u:145: darśitaprabhāvaḥ saṃkalitī, jyotiṣi sarvāsāṃ grahasaṃhitānāṃ pāradṛśvā,
GK19bahcar4u:146: sakalagaṇakamadhye mahito hitaśca trikālajñānabhāgbhojakastārako nāma gaṇakaḥ samupasṛtya vijñāpitavān--"deva! śrūyate māndhātā kilaivaṃvidhe
GK19bahcar4u:147: vyatīpātādisarvadoṣābhiṣaṅgharahite 'hani sarveṣūccasthānasthiteṣvevaṃ graheṣvīdṛśi lagne bheje janma /
GK19bahcar4u:148: arvāktato 'sminnantarāle punarevaṃvidhe yoge cakravarttijanane nājani jagati kaścidaparaḥ
GK19bahcar4u:149: saptānāṃ cakravartināmagraṇariścakravarticihnānāṃ mahāratnānāṃ ca bhājanaṃ saptānāṃ sāgarāṇāṃ pālayitā saptatantūnāṃ sarveṣāṃ pravartayitā saptasaptisamaḥ suto 'yaṃ devasya jātaḥ' iti atrāntare svayamevānādmātā api tāramadhuraṃ śahkhā viresuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:155: vavau cācirāccakrāyudhamutsṛjantyā lakṣmyā niśvāsa iva surāmodasurabhirdivyānilaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:159: prahatamaṅgalatūryapratiśabdanibhena dikṣu dikpālairapi pramoda dakriyatena diṣṭavṛddhikalakalaḥ
GK19bahcar4u:160: tatkṣaṇa eva ca śuklavāsaso brahnamukhāḥ kṛtayugaprajāpatayaiva prajāvṛddheye samupatasthire dvijātayaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:163: pralambaśmaśrujālajaṭilānanāni bahalamalapaṅkakalaṅkakālakāyāni naśyataḥ kalikālasya bāndhavakulānīvākulānyadhāvanta muktāni bandhanavṛndāni /
GK19bahcar4u:166: prāvatata ca vigatarājakulasthitiradhaḥkṛtapratīhārākṛtirapanītavetrivetro nirdeṣāntaḥpurapraveśaḥ samasvāmiparijano nirviśeṣabālavṛddhaḥ samānaśiṣṭāśiṣṭajano durjñeyamattāmattapravibhāgastulyakulayuvativeśyālāpavilāsaḥ pranṛttasakalakaṭakalokaḥ putrajanmotsavo mahān /
GK19bahcar4u:168: asuravivarāṇovāpāvṛtāni, nārāyaṇāvarodhānīva praskhalitāni, apsarasāmiva mahīmavatīrṇāni kulāni, parijanena pṛthukaraṇḍaparigṛhītāḥ snānīyacūrṇāvakīrṇakusumāḥ sumanaḥsrajaḥ,
GK19bahcar4u:172: sindūrapātrāṇi ca piṣṭātakapātrāṇi ca bālalatālambamānaviṭakavīṭakāṃśca tāmbūlavṛkṣakān bibhrāṇenānugamyamānāni caraṇanikuṭṭanaraṇitamaṇinūpuramukharitadiṅmukhāni nṛtyanti rājakulamāgacchanti samantāt sāmantāntaḥpurasahasrāṇyadṛsyanta /
GK19bahcar4u:182: saparvata iva kusumarāśibhiḥ, sādhāragṛha iva sīdhuprapābhiḥ,
GK19bahcar4u:183: sanandanavana iva pārijātakāmodaiḥ sanīhāra iva karpūrareṇubhiḥ, sāṭṭahāsa iva paṭaharavaiḥ, sāmṛtamathana iva mahākalakalaiḥ, sāṃvarta iva rāsakamaṇḍaleḥ, saromāñca iva bhūṣaṇamaṇikiraṇaiḥ, sapaṭṭabandha iva candanalalāṭikābhiḥ, saprasava iva pratiśabdakaiḥ, sapraroha iva prasādadānairutsavāmodaḥ skandhāvalambamānakesaramālāḥ kāmbojavājina ivāskandantaḥ, taralatārakā hariṇā ivoḍḍīyamānāḥ, sagarasutā iva khanitrairnirdayaiścaraṇābhighātairdārayanto bhuvam,
GK19bahcar4u:191: sthānasthāneṣu ca mandamandamāsphālyamānāliṅgyakena śiñjānamañjuveṇunā jhaṇajhaṇāyamānajhallarīkeṇa tāḍyamānatantrīpaṭahikena vādyamānānuttālālābuvīṇena kalakāṃsyakośīvkaṇitakāhalena samakāladīyamānānuttālatālikenātodyavādyenānugamyamānāḥ, pade pade jhaṇajhaṇitabhūṣaṇaravairapi sahṛdayairivānuvartamānatālalayāḥ, kokilā iva madakalakākalīkomalālāpinyaḥ, viṭānāṃ karṇāmṛtānyaślīlarāsakapadāni gāyantyaḥ, samuṇḍamālikāḥ, sakarṇapallavāḥ, sacandanatilakāḥ,
GK19bahcar4u:195: rāgāgninā, sindūracchaṭācchuritamukhamudrāḥ, śāsanapaṭṭapaṅktaya ivāpratihataśāsanasya kandarpasya, muṣṭiprakīryamāṇakarpūrapaṭavāsapāṃsulā manorathasaṃcaraṇarathyā iva yauvanasya, uddāmakusumadāmatāḍitataruṇajanāḥ pratīhārya iva taruṇamahotsavasya, prajalatpatrakuṇḍalā lasantyo latā iva
GK19bahcar4u:199: kusumadhūlimudgirantyaḥ, āviṣṭā iva narendravṛndaparivṛtāḥ, prītaya iva hṛdayamapaharantyaḥ, gītaya iva rāgamuddīpayantyaḥ, puṣṭaya
GK19bahcar4u:200: ivānandamutpādayantyaḥ, madamapi madayantya iva, rāgamapi rañjayantya iva,
GK19bahcar4u:201: ānandamapi ānandayantya iva, nṛtyamapi nartayamānā iva,
GK19bahcar4u:203: tarjaneṣu saṃyamayantya iva nakhamayūkhapāśaiḥ, kopābhinayeṣu tāḍayantaya iva bhrūlatāvibhāgaiḥ, praṇayasaṃbhāṣaṇeṣu varṣantya iva sarvarasān,
GK19bahcar4u:204: caturacaṅkramaṇeṣu vikirantya iva vikārān, paṇyavilāsinyaḥ prānṛtyan /
GK19bahcar4u:205: anyatra vetrivetravitrāsitajanadattāntarālāḥ dhriyamāṇadhavalātapatravanā vanadevatā iva kalpatarutalavicāriṇyaḥ kāścitskandhobhayapālīlambamānalambottarīyalagnahastā līlādolādhirūḍhā iva
GK19bahcar4u:211: kāścitkaṇṭhanihitakāñcanakāñcīguṇāñcitakañcukivikārākuñcitabruvaḥ kāmavāgurā iva prasāritabāhupāśā rājamahiṣyaḥ prārabdhanṛttā vilesuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:212: sarvataśca nṛtyataḥ streṇasya galadabhiḥ pādālaktakairaruṇitā rāgamayīva śuśoṇa kṣoṇī /
GK19bahcar4u:216: cañcalānāṃ cakṣuṣāmaṃ śubhiḥ kṛṣṇasāramayā ivāsan vāsarāḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:219: utkṣiptairhastakisalayaiḥ kamalinīmayya iva babhāsire sṛṣṭayaḥ māṇikyendrāyudhānāmarciṣā cārṣipatramayā iva cakāśire ravimarīcayaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:220: raṇatāmābharaṇagaṇānāṃ pratiśabdakaiḥ kiṅkiṇīmayya iva śiśiñjire diśaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:226: diśi diśi kuberakoṣā ivālupyanta lokena draviṇarāśayaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:227: evaṃ ca vṛtte tasminmahotsave, śanaiḥ śanaiḥ punarapyatikrāmati kāle, deve
GK19bahcar4u:231: hṛdayodbhidyamānadarpāṅkura iva, prathamāvyaktajalpitena satyasya śanaiḥśanaikaroṅkāramivakurvāṇe, mugdhasmitaiḥ kusumairiva madhukarakulāni
GK19bahcar4u:234: cāritraivāntaḥ purastrīkadambakena pālyamāne, mantra iva sacivamaṇḍalena
GK19bahcar4u:237: dhātrīkarāṅgulilagne pañcaṣāṇi padāni prayacchati harṣe, ṣaṣṭhaṃ varṣamavatarati ca rājyavardhane devī yaśomatī garbheṇādhatta nārāyaṇamūrtiriva vasudhāṃ devīṃ rājyaśriyam /
GK19bahcar4u:239: haṃsamadhurasvarāṃ śaradamiva prāvṛṭ, kusumasukumārāvayavāṃ vanarājimiva madhuśrīḥ, mahākanakāvadāta vasudhārāmiva dyauḥ, prabhāvarṣiṇīṃ ratnajātimiva velā, sakalajananayanānandakāriṇīṃ candralekhāmiva pratipat,
GK19bahcar4u:240: sahasranetradarśanayogyāṃ jayantīmiva śacī, sarvabhūbhudabhyarthitāṃ gaurīmiva menā prasūtavatī duhitaram /
GK19bahcar4u:241: yayā dvayoḥ sutayorapi stanayorivaikāvalīlatayā nitarāmarājata jananī /
GK19bahcar4u:242: arimanneva tu kāle devyā yaśomatyā bhrātā sutamaṣṭavarṣadeśīyamudbhūyamānakuṭilakākapakṣakaśikhaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaparaśuhuṅkārāgnidhūmalekhānubaddhamūrdhānaṃ makaradhvajamiva
GK19bahcar4u:244: trikaṇṭakamuktāphalālokadhavalitena saṃpṛttāvatāramiva hariharayordarśayantam, pīnaprakoṣṭhapratiṣṭhitapuṣpalohavalayaṃ paraśurāmamiva kṣatrakṣapaṇakṣīṇaparasupāśacihnitaṃ bālatāḍgatam,
GK19bahcar4u:247: avanipatestu tasyopari putrayostṛtīyasya netrayoriveśvarasya tulyaṃ darśanamāsīt /
GK19bahcar4u:248: rājaputrāvapi sakalajīvalokahṛdayānādadāyinī tena prakṛtidakṣiṇena madhumādhavāviva malayamārutenopetau nitarāṃ rejatuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:249: krameṇacāpareṇeva bhrātrā prajānandena saha vardhamānau yauvanamavateratuḥ
GK19bahcar4u:250: sthirorustambhau ca pṛthuprakoṣṭhau dīrghabhujārgalau vikaṭoraḥkavāṭau prāṃśuśālābhirāmau mahānagarasaṃniveśāviva sarvalokāśrayakṣamau babhūvatuḥ
GK19bahcar4u:258: amāntāvivātimānenāsannavelārgalanirodhasaṃkaṭe kukuṭīrake, tejaḥparāṅmukhī chāyāmapi jugupsamānau, svātmapratibimbenāpi pādanakhalagnena lajjamānau,
GK19bahcar4u:265: bhūbhṛdapahṛtalakṣmīkaṃ sāgaramapyupahasantau, balavantamakṛtavigrahaṃ mārutamapi nindantau, himavato 'pi camarībālavyajanavījitena dahyamānau,
GK19bahcar4u:267: pracetasamapyasahamānau, anapahṛtacchatrānapi vicchāyānavanipālān kurvāṇau, sādhuṣvapyasevitaprasannau, mukhena madhukṣarantau,
GK19bahcar4u:269: karatalamudvahantau, yogyākāleṣu dhīrairdhanurdhvanibhirabhyarṇopabhogādigvadhūbhirivālapantau rājyavardhana iti harṣa iti sarvasyāmeva pṛthivyāmāvirbhūtaśabdaprādurbhāvau svalpīyasaiva kālena dvīpāntareṣvapi prakāśatāṃ jagmatuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:270: ekadā ca tāvāhūya bhuktavānabhyantaragataḥ pitā sasnehamavādīt--"vatsau!
GK19bahcar4u:272: prāyeṇa paramāṇava iva samavāyeṣvanuguṇībhūya dravyaṃ kurvanti pārthivaṃ kṣudrāḥ krīḍārasena nartayantatau mayūratāṃ nayanti bāliśāḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:275: gītanṛtyahasitairunmattatāmāvahantyapekṣitā vikārā iva vātikāḥ, cātakā iva tṛṣṇāvanto na śakyante grahītumakulīnāḥ mānase mīnamiva
GK19bahcar4u:279: yataḥ sarvairebhirdeṣābhiṣaṅgairasaṃgatau babhudhaipadhābhiḥ parīkṣitau śucī vinītau vikrāntāvabhirūpau mālavarājaputrau bhrātarau bujāviva me śarīrādavyatiriktau kumāraguptamādhavaguptanāmānāvasmābhirbhavatoranucaratvārthamimau nirdiṣṭau /
GK19bahcar4u:282: na cirād dvāradeśanihitalocanau rājyavardhanaharṣau pratīhāreṇa saha
GK19bahcar4u:285: anavaratābhyastalaṅghanaghanopacayakaṭhinamāṃsamedurādūrudvayānniṣpatatevānulvaṇajānugranthiprasūtena tanutarajaṅghākāṇḍayugalena bhāsamānam, ullikhitapārśvaprakāśitakraśimnā mandaramiva surāsurarabhasabhramitavāsukikaṣaṇakṣīṇena madhyena lakṣyamāṇam ativistīrṇenorasā svāmisaṃbhāvanānāmaparimitānāmavakāśamiva
GK19bahcar4u:291: svāmyanurāgamivāmlātakamuttaṃsīkṛtaṃ śirasā dhārayantam, nirdayayā kaṅkaṇabhaṅgabhītasakalakārmukārpitāmiva namratāṃ prakāśayantatam, śaiśava eva nirjitairindriyairaribhiriva saṃyataiḥ śobhamānam, praṇayinīmiva viśvāsabhūmiṃ kulaputratāmanuvratamānam, tejasvinamapi śīlenāhlādakena savitāramiva śaśinātargatena virājamānam, acalānāmapi kāyakārkhasyena gandhanamivācarantam, darśanakrītamānandaste vikrīṇānamiva jana
GK19bahcar4u:293: ca manaḥ śilāśelamiva saṃcarantam, anulbaṇamālatīkusumaśekharanibhena nirjigamiṣatā guruṇa śirasi cumbitamiva yaśasā,
GK19bahcar4u:294: parasparaviruddhayorvinayayauvanayościrāt prathamasaṃgamacihnamiva bhrūsaṃgatakena kathayantam, atidhīratayā hṛdayanihitā svāmibhaktimiva
GK19bahcar4u:295: niścalāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ dhārayantam, acchācchacandanarasānulepanaśītalaṃ saṃnihitahāropadhānaṃ vakṣaḥsthalamanantasāmantasaṃkrānti śrāntāyāḥ śriyo viśālaṃ śaśimaṇiśilāpaṭṭaśayanamiva bibrāṇam, cakṣuḥ kuraṅgakairghoṇāvaṃśaṃ varāhauḥ skandhapīṭhaṃ mahiṣaiḥ prakoṣṭhabandhaṃ
GK19bahcar4u:296: vyāghraiḥ parākramaṃ kesaribhirgamanaṃ mataṅgajairmṛgayākṣapitaśeṣairbhītairutkocamiva dattaṃ darśayanta mādhavaguptaṃ dadṛśatuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:297: praviśya ca tau dūrādeva caturbhirahgairuttamāṅgena ca gāṃ spṛśantau namaścakratuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:299: muhūrtaṃ ca sthitvā bhūpatirādideśa tau--"adyaprabhṛti bhavadbhyāṃ
GK19bahcar4u:304: tataścārabhya kṣaṇamapi nimeṣonmeṣāviva cakṣurgocarādanapayāntāvucchvāsaniḥśvāsāviva naktandivamabhimukhasthitau bhujāviva satatapārśvavartinau kumārayostau babhūvatuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:305: atha rājyaśrīrapi nṛttagītādiṣu vidagdhāsu sakhīṣu sakalāsu kalāsu ca pratidivasamupacīyamānaparicayā śanaiḥ śanairavardhata /
GK19bahcar4u:307: nipeturekasyāṃ tasyāṃ śarā iva lakṣyabhuvi bhūbhujāṃ sarveṣāṃ dṛṣaśṭayaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:309: kadācittu rājāntaḥpuraprasādasthito bāhyakakṣyāvasthitena puruṣeṇa svaprastāvāgatāṃ gīyamānāmāryāmaśṛṇot--
GK19bahcar4u:312: tāṃ ca śrutvā pārśvasthitāṃ mahādevīmutsāritaparijano jagāda--"devi!
GK19bahcar4u:314: etadīyā guṇavatteva kṣaṇamapi hṛdayānnāpayāti me cintā /
GK19bahcar4u:315: yauvanārambha eva ca kanyakānābhindhanībhavanti pitaraḥ saṃtāpānalasya /
GK19bahcar4u:317: kenāpi kṛtā dharmyā nābhimatā me sthitireyaṃ yadaṅgasaṃbhūtānyaṅkalālitānyaparityājyānyapatyakānyakāṇḍa evāgatyāsaṃstutairnīyante /
GK19bahcar4u:319: seyaṃ sarvābhibhāvinī śokāgnedahiśaktiryadapatyatve samāne 'pi jātāyāṃ duhitari dūyante santaḥ
GK19bahcar4u:320: etadrathaṃ janmakāla eva kanyakābhyaḥ prayacchanti salilamaśrubiḥ sādhavaḥ
GK19bahcar4u:322: ko hi nāma saheta sacetano virahamapatyānām /
GK19bahcar4u:323: yathā yathā samāpatanti dūtā varāṇāṃ varākī lajjamāneva cintā tathā tathā nitarāṃ praviśati mehṛdayam /
GK19bahcar4u:327: dharaṇīdharāṇāṃ ca mūrdhni sthito māheśvarā pādanyāsa iva sakalabhuvananamaskṛto maukharo vaṃśaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:328: tatrāpi tilakabhūtasyāvantivarmaṇaḥ sūnuragrajo grahavarmā nāma grahapatiriva gāṃ gataḥ pituranyūno guṇairenāṃ prārthayate /
GK19bahcar4u:329: yadi bhavatyā api matiranumanyate tatastasmai dātumicchāmi' ityuktavati bhartari duhitṛsnehakātaratarahadayā sāśrulocanā mahādevī pratyuvāca--āryaputra! saṃvardhanamātropayoginyo dhātrīnirviśeṣā bhavanti
GK19bahcar4u:333: yathā neyaṃ yāvajjavīvamāvayorārgitāṃ prati padyate tathāryaputra eva
GK19bahcar4u:335: rājā tu jātaniścayo duhitṛdānaṃ prati samāhūya sutāvapi viditārthāvakārṣīt /
GK19bahcar4u:336: śobhate ca divase grahavarmaṇā kanyāṃ prārthayituṃ preṣitasya pūrvāgatasyaiva pradhānadūtapuruṣasya kare sarvarājakulasamakṣaṃ duhitṛdānalalamapātayat /
GK19bahcar4u:337: jātamudi kṛtārthe gate ca tasminnāsanneṣu ca
GK19bahcar4u:358: prārabdhavividhavyāpāram, āsūryodayācca praviṣṭābhiḥ satībhiḥ subhagābhiḥ surūpābhiḥ suveśābhiravidha vābhiḥ sindūrarajorājirājitalalāṭābhirvadhūvarago tragrahaṇagarbhāṇi
GK19bahcar4u:359: śrutisubhagāni maṅgalāni gāyantībhirbahuvidhavarṇakādigdhāṅgulībhirgrīvāsūtrāṇi ca citrayantībhiscitralatālekhyakuśalābhiḥ kalaśāṃśca dhavalitāñśītalaśārājiraśreṇīśca maṇḍayantībhirabhinnapuṭakarpāsatūlapallavāṃśca vaivāhikakaṅkaṇorṇāsūtrasaṃnāhāṃśca rañjayantībhirbalāśanāghṛtaghanīkṛtakuṅkumakalkamiśritāṃścāṅgarāgāṃllāvaṇyaviśeṣakṛnti ca mukhālepanāni kalpayantībhiḥ kakkolamiśrāḥ sjātīphalāḥ sphuratsphītasphāṭikakarpūraśakalakhacitāntarālā lavaṅgamālā racayantībhiḥ
GK19bahcar4u:361: bahuvidhabhaktinirmāṇanipuṇapurāṇapaurapurandhribadhyamānairbaddhaiścācāracaturāntaḥ purajaratījanitapūjārājamānarajakarajyamānai raktaiścobhayapaṭāntalagnaparijanapreṅkholitaiśchāyāsu śoṣyamāṇaiḥ śuṣkaiśca kuṭilakramarūpakriyamāṇapallavaparabhāgairaparairārabdhakuṅkumapaṅkasthāsakacchuraṇeraparairudbhujabhujiṣyabhajyamānabhaṅgurottarīyaiḥ kṣaumaiśca bādaraiśca dukūlaiśca lālātantujaiścāṃśukaiśca netraisca nirmokanibhairakaṭhorarambhāgarbhakomalairniḥśvāsahāryaiḥ sparśānumeyairvāsobhiḥ sarvataḥ sphuradbhirindrāyudhasahasrairiva
GK19bahcar4u:363: stavarakanivahanirantaracchādyamānasamastapaṭalaiśca maṇḍapairuccitranetrapaṭaveṣṭyamānaiśca stambhairujjvalaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ cautsukyadaṃ ca maṅgalyaṃ cāsīdrājakulam /
GK19bahcar4u:364: devī tu yaśomatī vivāhotsavaparyākulahṛdayā hṛdayena bhartari, kutūhalena
GK19bahcar4u:365: jāmātari, snehena duhitari, upacāreṇa nimantritastrīṣu, ādeśena parijane,
GK19bahcar4u:366: śarīreṇa saṃcaraṇe, cakṣuṣā kṛtākṛtapratyavekṣaṇeṣu, ānandena mahotsave,
GK19bahcar4u:368: bhūpatirapyuparyupari visarjitoṣṭravāmījanitajāmātṛjoṣaḥ satyapyājñāsaṃpādanadakṣe mukhekṣaṇapare parijane samaṃ putrābhyāṃ duhitṛsnehavivalavaḥ sarvaṃ svayamakarot /
GK19bahcar4u:369: evaṃ ca tasminnavidhavāmaya iva bhavati rājakule, maṅgalamaya iva jāyamāne
GK19bahcar4u:370: jīvaloke, cāraṇamayeṣviva lakṣyamāṇeṣu diṅmukheṣu, paṭaharavamaya iva kṛte
GK19bahcar4u:371: 'ntarikṣe, bhūṣaṇamaya iva bhramati parijane, bāndhavamaya iva dṛśyamāne
GK19bahcar4u:372: sarge, nirvṛtimaya ivopalakṣyamāṇe kāle, lakṣmīmaya iva vijṛmbhamāṇe
GK19bahcar4u:373: mahotsave nidhāna iva sukhasya, phala iva janmanaḥ pariṇāma iva puṇyasya,
GK19bahcar4u:374: yauvana iva vibhūteḥ, yauvarājya iva prīteḥ, siddhikāla iva manorathasya
GK19bahcar4u:375: vartamāne, gaṇyamāna iva janāṅgulobhiḥ, ālokyamāna iva mārgadhvajaiḥ,
GK19bahcar4u:376: pratyudgamyamāna iva maḍgalyavādyapratiśbadakaiḥ, āhūyamāna iva mauhūrtikaiḥ, ākṛṣyamāṇa iva manorathaiḥ, pariṣvajyamāna iva vadhūsakhīhṛdayairājagāma vivāhadivasaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:379: jāmāturantikāttāmbūladāyakaḥ pārijātakanāmā saṃptāptaḥ' ityabhidhāya svākāraṃ yuvānamadarśayat
GK19bahcar4u:380: rājā tu taṃ dūrādeva jāmātṛbahumānāddarśitādaraḥ "bālaka! kaccitkuśalī
GK19bahcar4u:382: asau tu samākarmitanarādhipadhvanirdhāvamānaḥ katicitpadānyupasṛtya prasārya ca bāhū sevācaturaściraṃ vasuṃdharāyāṃ nirdhāya mūrdhānamutthāya "deva! kuśalau yathājñāpayasyarcayati ca devaṃ namaskāreṇa' iti vyajñāpayat /
GK19bahcar4u:383: āgatajāmātṛnivedanāgataṃ ca taṃ jñātvā kṛtasatkāraṃ rājā "yāminyāḥ
GK19bahcar4u:384: prathame yāme vivāhakālātyayakṛto yathā na bhavati doṣaḥ' iti saṃdiśya pratīpaṃ prāhiṇot
GK19bahcar4u:385: atha sakalakamalavanalakṣmīṃ vadhūmukha iva saṃcārya samavasite vāsare,
GK19bahcar4u:387: vadhūvarānurāgalaghūkṛtapremalajjiteṣviva vighaṭamāneṣu cakravākamithuneṣu, saubhāgyadhvaja iva raktāṃ śukasukumāravapuṣi nabhasi sphurati saṃdhyārāge, kapotakaṇṭhakarvure varayātrāgamanarajasīva kaluṣayati diṅmukhāni timire, lagnasaṃpādanasajja ivojjihāne jyotirgaṇe
GK19bahcar4u:390: muhurmuhurullāsitasphārasphuritāruṇacāmaraimanorathairivotthitarāgāgrapallavaiḥ puraudhāvamānaiḥ pādātairutkarṇakaṭakahayapratiheṣitadīyamānasvāgatairiva vājināṃ vṛndairāpūritadigvibhāgaḥ, calakarṇacāmarāṇāṃ cāmīkaramaya sarvopakaraṇānāṃ varṇakalambināṃ balināṃ ghaṇṭāṭāṅkāriṇāṃ kariṇāṃ ghaṭābhiḥ, ghaṭayanniva punarindūdayavilīnamandhakāram,
GK19bahcar4u:391: nakṣatramālāmaṇḍitamukhīṃ kariṇariṃ niśākara iva paurandarīṃ diśamārūḍhaḥ,
GK19bahcar4u:392: prakaṭitavividhavihagavirutaistālāvacaracāraṇaiḥ puraḥsarairbālo vasanta ivopavanaiḥ kriyamāgakolāhalaḥ, gandhatailāvasekasugandhinā tīpikācakravālālokena kuṅkumapaṭavāsadhūlipaṭaleneva piñjarīkurvansakalaṃ
GK19bahcar4u:396: kusumasaurabhagarvabhrāntabhramarakulakalakalapralāpasubhagaḥ pārijāta iva jātaḥ śriyā saha punaravatārito medinīm,
GK19bahcar4u:397: navavadhūvadanāvalokanakutūhaleneva kṛṣyamāṇahṛdayaḥ patanniva mukhena pratyāsannalagno grahavarmā
GK19bahcar4u:398: rājā tu tamupadvāramāgataṃ caraṇābhyāmeva rājacakrānugamyamānaḥ sasutaḥ pratyujjagāma /
GK19bahcar4u:399: avatīrṇaṃ ca taṃ kṛtanamaskāraṃ manmathamiva mādhavaḥ prasāritabhujo gāḍhamāliliṅga /
GK19bahcar4u:400: yathākramaṃ pariṣvaktarājyavardhanaharṣaṃ ca haste gṛhītvābhyantaraṃ ninye
GK19bahcar4u:402: na cirācca gambhīranāmā nṛpateḥ praṇayī vidvāndvijanamā
GK19bahcar4u:403: grahavarmāṇamuvāca--"tāta! tvāṃ prāpya cirātkhalu rājyaśriyā ghaṭitau tejomayau sakalajagadgoyamānabudhakarṇānandakāriguṇagaṇau somasūryavaṃśāviva puṣyabhūtimukaravaṃśau /
GK19bahcar4u:404: prathamameva kaustubhamaṇiriva guṇaiḥ sthito 'si hṛdaye devasya /
GK19bahcar4u:405: idānīṃ tu śaśīva sirasā parameśvareṇāsi voḍhavyo jātaḥ' iti /
GK19bahcar4u:406: evaṃ vadatyeva tasminnṛpamupasṛtya mauhūrtikāḥ "deva! samāsīdati lagnavelā /
GK19bahcar4u:408: atha narendreṇa "uttiṣṭha, gaccha' iti gadito grahavarmā praviśyānta puraṃ jāmātṛdarśanakutūhalinīnāṃ strīṇāṃ patitāni locanasahasrāṇi vikacanīlakuvalayavanānīva laṅghayannāsasāda kautukagṛhadvāram nivāritaparijanaśca praviveśa /
GK19bahcar4u:419: prabhālāvaṇyamadasaurabhamādhuryaiḥ kaustubhaśaśimadirāpārijātāmṛtaprabhavaiḥ sarvaratnaguṇairaparāṇiva surāsurasṣā ratnākareṇa kalpitāṃ śriyam, snigdhena bālikālokena sitasiraṇamarakataprabhāharitaśādvalena kapolasthalītalena vinodayantīmiva
GK19bahcar4u:421: kutamukhannamanaprayatnaṃ sakhījanaṃ hṛdayaṃ ca nirbhartsayantī vadhūmapaśyat /
GK19bahcar4u:422: praviśantameva taṃ hṛdayacauraṃ vadhvā samarpitaṃ jagrāha kandarpaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:423: parihāsasmeramkhībiśca nārībhiḥ kautukagṛhe yadyatkāryate jāmatātā tattatsarvamatipeśalaṃ cakāra /
GK19bahcar4u:424: kṛtapariṇayānurūpaveśaparigrahāṃ gṛhītvā kare vadhūṃ nirjagāma jagāma ca navasudhādhavalā nimantritāgataistuṣāraśailopatyakāmiva tryambakāmbikāvivāhāhūtairbhūbhṛdbhiḥ parivṛtām,
GK19bahcar4u:432: āruroha ca tāṃ divamiva sajyotsnaḥ śaśī /
GK19bahcar4u:433: samutsasarpa ca vellitāruṇaśikhāpallavasya śikhinaḥ kusumāyudha iva ratidvitīyo raktāśokasya samīpam /
GK19bahcar4u:434: hute ca hutabhuji pradakṣiṇāvartapravṛttābhirvadhūvadanavilokanakutūhalinībhiriva jvālābhireva saha pradakṣiṇaṃ babhrāma /
GK19bahcar4u:438: parisamāpitavaivāhikakriyākalāpastu jāmātā vadhvā smaṃ praṇanāma śvaśurau
GK19bahcar4u:439: praviveśa ca dvārapakṣalikhitaratipratidaivataṃ, praṇayibhiriva prathamapraviṣṭairalikulaiḥ kṛtakolāhalam, alikulapakṣapavanapreṅkholitaiḥ karṇotpalaprahārabhayaprakampitairiva maṅgalapradīpaiḥ prakāśitam,
GK19bahcar4u:441: ekapārśvanyastena kāñcanācāmarukeṇetarapārsvavatinyā ca dāntaśapharukadhāriṇyā kanakaputrikayā sākṣāllakṣmyevoddaṇḍapuṇḍarīkahastayā sanāthena sopadhānena svāstīrṇena śayanena śobhamānam, śayanasirobhāgasthitena ca kṛtakumudaśobhena
GK19bahcar4u:442: kusumāyudhasāhāyakāyāgatena śaśineva nidrākalaśena rājatena virājamānaṃ vāsagṛham /
GK19bahcar4u:443: tatra ca hrītāyā navavadhūkāyāḥ parāṅmukhaprasuptāyā maṇibhittidarpaṇeṣu mukhapratibimbāni prathamālāpākarṇanakautukāgatagṛhadevatānanānīva maṇigavākṣakeṣu vīkṣamāṇaḥ kṣaṇadāṃ ninye sthitvā ca śvaśurakule śīlenāmṛtamiva śvaśrūhṛdaye varṣannabhinavābhinavopacārairapunaruktānyānandamayāni daśa dināni, dattvā ca rājadauvārikamiva rājakule raṇaraṇakaṃ yautakaniveditānīva
GK19bahcar4u:444: śambalānyādāya hṛdayāni sarvalarokasya kathaṅkathamapi visarjito nṛpeṇa vadhvā saha svadeśamagamaditi
GK19bahcar4u:445: iti śrīmahākavibāṇamaṭṭakṛtau harṣacarite cakravartijanmavarṇanaṃ nāma caturtha ucchvāsaḥ/
